name: Easy Refried Beans
description: These refried beans are delicious and so easy to make. This refried bean recipe is quick, tooâ€”use canned beans and they're ready in 25 minutes! Plus, these beans are healthy, vegan and gluten free. Recipe yields 4 servings.
recipeIngredient: 1/2 cup finely chopped yellow or white onion (about 1/2 small onion)
2 cans (15 ounces each) pinto beans, rinsed and drained, or 3 cups cooked pinto beans
1 tablespoon lime juice (about 1/2 medium lime), to taste

recipeInstructions.text: In a medium saucepan over medium heat, warm the olive oil until shimmering. Add the onions and salt. Cook, stirring occasionally, until the onions have softened and are turning translucent, about 5 to 8 minutes.
